text: Wið eafodece pollege þæt on englis dwyrcgedwosle wulle on ele odðer on clane butere & smyre þæt heafod mid.
Wið ealda & singalum heafoðece cnuca þa wurd þat bete hatad & gnid on þa þunwunge & ufan þæt heafod.
Eft wiþ þat ylce cnuca cyleþene on ecede & smire mid þæt heafod bufan þa eagen.
Nim þæt mycele fearn niðeweard & eallan rinde cnuca tosomne & mede drosna do þarto & beþweh hine wel wearme.
Gif syna scrincon nim mucgwyrte gebeatene & wid ele gemenged gelogode smyre mid.
Mucgwyrte seaw seoþ on ele smira mid.
Wið heafodece genim bettonican & pipor gignid togadere læt ane niht hangie on claðe & smira mid þat heafod.
Wið sceancena sarnyssa & fotece, bettonica & georma leaf & finul & ribban ealra efenfela & gemeng wyd mylc & wyð wæter & beþa mid.
